title: In case the concerned landowner has failed to submit the scheme as per the preceding regulation and the slum dwellers have come forward through a Registered Co-operative Society or through a Registered Developer whom 51% of them have given consent, the C
clause_text: In case the concerned landowner has failed to submit the scheme as per the preceding regulation and the slum dwellers have come forward through a Registered Co-operative Society or through a Registered Developer whom 51% of them have given consent, the C.E.O., S.R.A. shall acquire the land under the slum, at the instance of Co-operative Society or Registered Developer. The C.E.O. will simultaneously issue order to the Competent Authority concerned to prepare and submit the Eligibility List. (Annexure II)

source_pdf.filename: UDCPR Updated 30.01.25 with earlier provisions & corrections_compressed.docx
